get.summary: Get configured authentication method

schema.description: Configured authentication method

post.summary: Authenticate with username and password for JWT. Only available if JWT is the configured method.

accountName.description: Account name of the user to authenticate

requestBody.description: Data for the new attribute group

get.summary: Get a single attribute group by id
Count attributes that exists in items of the given item type and where the attribute types are in the given attribute groups

schema.description: Number of attributes that exists in items of the given item type and where the attribute types are in the given attribute groups

get.summary: Check, if the given attribute group can be deleted (i. e. is not used in any other context)

schema.description: true, if there are no obstacles, false if there are attribute types of that group

get.summary: Returns all attribute group objects as an array
Return all attribute group objects that belong to a given item type as an array
Return all attribute group objects that do not belong to the given item type as an array

requestBody.description: Data for the new attribute type

get.summary: Get a single attribute type by id

post.summary: Convert attribute type to item type and migrate all attributes of that type to items

get.summary: Check, if the given attribute type can be deleted (i. e. is not used in any other context)

schema.description: true, if there are no obstacles, false if attributes of that type exist

get.summary: Returns the number of existing attributes of the given attribute type

schema.description: Number of attributes with the given attribute type

get.summary: Returns those attribute types whose values are coherent to the values of the given attribute type and can therefore be migrated together with the attribute type
Return all attribute type objects as an array
Return all attribute type objects that belong to the given attribute group as an array
Return all attribute type objects that belong to the given item type as an array

requestBody.description: Data for the new connection type

get.summary: Get a single connection type by id
Check, if the given connection type can be deleted (i. e. is not used in any other context)

schema.description: true, if there are no obstacles, false if connection rules with the given type exist

get.summary: Return all connection type objects as an array
Return all connection type objects that can be used with the given item type as upper item type

requestBody.description: Data for the new item type

get.summary: Get a single item type by id
Check, if the given item type can be deleted (i. e. is not used in any other context)

schema.description: true, if there are no obstacles, false, if items of that type or connection rules with that type exist

get.summary: Returns an array with all item types.
Returns the lower item types, that are allowed to be connected to for a given upper item type and connection type, in an array
Returns the uppwer item types, that are allowed to be connected to for a given lowper item type and connection type, in an array
Returns the item types, that have the same attribute group mapped as the given attribute type

requestBody.description: Data for the new connection rule

get.summary: Get a single connection rule by id
Check, if the given connection rule can be deleted (i. e. is not used in any other context)

schema.description: true, if there are no obstacles, false if the connection rule is used inside connections

get.summary: Returns the number of existing connections of the given connection rule

schema.description: Number of connections

get.summary: Returns a single connection rule defined by its unique content.
Return all connection rule objects as an array
Return all connection rule objects that belong to the given item type in any position as an array
Returns all connection rules that exists between two item types as an array
Returns all connection rules that contain the given upper item type
Returns all connection rules that that contain the given lower item type
Return all meta data objects in one huge object, for performance reasons
Returns information about the user currently authenticated
Returns the role of the currently authenticated user
Returns all users as an array
Returns a list of users where the account name matches a part of the given text.

requestBody.description: Data for the new configuration item

post.summary: Create a new Configuration item with connections

requestBody.description: Data for the new configuration item

name.description: Name of the configuration item, unique for each item type

typeId.description: Id of the attribute type, must be allowd by the item type

value.description: Value of the item type, must match the regex pattern of the validation expression of the attribute type

links.description: Links to external websites for the item

uri.description: Url of the link, must be http or https

users.description: List of the users that are responsible for the item, i.e. are able to change it

connectionsToUpper.description: Data for full connections to create

ruleId.description: Id of the connection rule. Rule must contain given item type as lower item type.

typeId.description: Id of the connection type. If set, it must be equal to the connection type of the rule.

targetId.description: Id of the configuration item to connect. Type of the target item must comply to upper item type in connection rule.

description.description: Connection description, must match the validation expression of the rule.

connectionsToLower.description: Data for full connections to create

ruleId.description: Id of the connection rule. Rule must contain given item type as upper item type.

typeId.description: Id of the connection type. If set, it must be equal to the connection type of the rule.

targetId.description: Id of the configuration item to connect. Type of the target item must comply to lower item type in connection rule.

description.description: Connection description, must match the validation expression of the rule.

get.summary: Get a single configuration item by id

post.summary: Search for specific items along connections, beginning at the given configuration item type

schema.description: Array with an object of items that were found.

get.summary: Get a configuration item with connections by id
Get a configuration item's history by id, even for deleted items
Returns an item that matches the given item type and name.
Get a configuration item's connections

schema.description: Array with connection objects belonging to the given item

get.summary: Get a configuration item's connections to items above the current

schema.description: Array with connection objects belonging to the given item

get.summary: Get a configuration item's connections below the current item

schema.description: Array with connection objects belonging to the given item

get.summary: Get all configuration items

schema.description: Returns a portion of the whole number of configuration items.

items.description: Array with connection objects belonging to the given item

totalItems.description: Number of all items to be found. If it is greater than the count of the items array, then more pages can be retrieved.

get.summary: Get all configuration items

schema.description: Returns a portion of the whole number of configuration items with connections.

items.description: Array with connection objects belonging to the given item

totalItems.description: Number of all items to be found. If it is greater than the count of the items array, then more pages can be retrieved.

post.summary: performs a search for configuration items in the database and returns a list with results.

requestBody.description: Search criteria to filter the list

schema.description: List of configuration items that match all of the given criteria.

post.summary: performs a search for configuration items in the database and returns a list with results, including the connections.

requestBody.description: Search criteria to filter the list

schema.description: List of configuration items with connections, that match all of the given criteria.

get.summary: Get all configurations items with the given ids.

schema.description: List of configuration items that have one of the given ids. If an id cannot be found, no error is thrown.

get.summary: Get all configurations items with their connections with the given ids.

schema.description: List of configuration items with connections, that have one of the given ids. If an id cannot be found, no error is thrown..

get.summary: Get all configurations items that belong to the given type(s).

schema.description: List of configuration items that belong to the given item type.

get.summary: Get all configurations items with their connections, that belong to the given type(s).

schema.description: List of configuration items with connections, that belong to the given item type.

get.summary: Returns configuration items that are not connected due to the given rule or whose connections count plus the given count doesn't exceed the allowed range.

schema.description: List of configuration items that match the given criteria.

get.summary: Returns configuration items that are connectable as lower item for the given rule.
get.description: That means, they are of the appropriate type and do have at least one free connection.

schema.description: List of configuration items that match the given criteria.

get.summary: Returns configuration items that are connectable as lower item for the given configuration item and rule.
get.description: That means, they are of the appropriate type, do have at least one free connection and are not already connected to the current item.

schema.description: List of configuration items that match the given criteria.

get.summary: Returns configuration items that are connectable as upper item for the given configuration item and rule.
get.description: That means, they are of the appropriate type, do have at least one free connection and are not already connected to the current item.

schema.description: List of configuration items that match the given criteria.

get.summary: Get a single connection by id
Return a portion of the whole number of connection objects as an array

schema.description: Object with connections

totalConnections.description: Total number of connections in database

post.summary: Uploads an XLSX or CSV file and converts it into a JSON structure

requestBody.description: XLSX or CSV file with a workbook name

put.summary: Imports objects from a table of data

requestBody.description: A table that has the column descriptions and cells with data

itemTypeId.description: Unique id of the item type that will be imported

targetType.description: Type of the column to be imported

targetId.description: Unique id of the item or attribute that will be imported

items.description: Name of the item to connect to, value of the attribute or link address or description

message.description: Result of the action that was performed

severity.description: Severity of the message: 0 = info, 1 = warning, 2 = error (line could not be imported completely), 3 = fatal (stopped import)

error.description: An error object with a message

validationError.description: An error object that enumerates all validation errors

color.description: Color code of an item type

attributeGroupBasic.description: An attribute group object that handles multiple attribute types, without id, for creating.

name.description: Unique name of the attribute group

attributeGroup.description: An attribute group object that handles multiple attribute types.

attributeTypeBasic.description: An attribute type object for creating.

name.description: Unique name of the attribute type

attributeGroupId.description: id of the attribute group to which the attribute type belongs

validationExpression.description: Regular expression that is used for validation of attribute values

attributeGroupName.description: name of the attribute group to which the attribute type belongs

attributeTypeToItemTypePayload.description: Data needed for migrating an attribute type into an item type

newItemTypeName.description: Name of the new item type. If it is not set, the name of the attribute type will be used instead.

backColor.description: Background color of the new item type.

connectionTypeId.description: Id of the connections type to use when creating new connection rules.

position.description: The position of the new item in connections to the processed items

attributeTypesToTransfer.description: Ids of attributes types that will be transferred to the new item type while processing

itemType.description: Item type that was created or used in process

items.description: Items that were changed in process

connections.description: Connections that were created while processing request

deletedAttributeType.description: Attribute type that was deleted at the end of the process

connectionTypeBasic.description: A connection type object for creating.

name.description: Unique name of the connection type when viewing from the upper item

reverseName.description: Name of the connection type when viewing from the lower item

itemTypeBasic.description: An item type object for creation.

name.description: Unique name of the item type

attributeGroups.description: Attribute groups that are mapped to the item type

connectionRuleBasic.description: A connection rule object for creating. It allows connections between items of two different types.

upperItemTypeId.description: Unique id of the item type in the upper position

connectionTypeId.description: Unique id of the connection type

lowerItemTypeId.description: Unique id of the item type in the lower position

maxConnectionsToUpper.description: Maximum nunber of connections, that an item of the lower type can have with items of the upper type

maxConnectionsToLower.description: Maximum nunber of connections, that an item of the upper type can have with items of the lower type

validationExpression.description: Regular expression that is used for validation of attribute values

connectionRule.description: A connection rule object. It allows connections between items of two different types.

userInfo.description: Object with data about a user

passphrase.description: (Only required for JWT): Passphrase for the user

configurationItemBasic.description: A configuration item object for creating.

name.description: Name of the configuration item, unique for each item type

typeId.description: Id of the attribute type, must be allowd by the item type

value.description: Value of the item type, must match the regex pattern of the validation expression of the attribute type

links.description: Links to external websites for the item

uri.description: Url of the link, must be http or https

users.description: List of the users that are responsible for the item, i.e. are able to change it

fullConnection.description: transformed connection object for full configuration items

ruleId.description: Id of the connection rule. Rule must contain given item type as target (upper or lower) item type.

typeId.description: Id of the connection type. If set, it must be equal to the connection type of the rule.

type.description: Name of the connection type in the target's direction, i.e. forward for connections to lower and reverse for connections to upper.

targetId.description: Id of the configuration item to connect. Type of the target item must comply to target item type in connection rule.

targetTypeId.description: Id of the item type of the connection rule.

targetName.description: Name of the target configuration item.

targetColor.description: Color code of the target item type

description.description: Connection description, must match the validation expression of the rule.

connectionBasic.description: A connection object for creating, linking two configuration items together in a hierarchy

upperItem.description: Id of the configuration item in the upper position.

lowerItem.description: Id of the configuration item in the lower position.

description.description: Description of the connection, must match the validation expression of the connection rule.

connection.description: A connection object, linking two configuration items together in a hierarchy

neighborItem.description: A neighbor search result, containing a configuration item

level.description: Levels apart from the origin item

path.description: Path from the origin item that leads to this item

direction.description: Direction, in which the path was created. -1 = up, 0 = both, 1 = down

fullItem.description: The item that was found, together with all connections.

itemHistory.description: An object representing all historic states of a configuration item

lastChange.description: Date and time when the item was last changed.

oldVersions.description: Data objects with all old versions of the item.

items.description: Object containing a historic version of the item.

type.description: Historic type name of the item.

changedAt.description: Date, when the change to this version occured.

items.description: An object with a historic attribute.

type.description: Historic type name of the attribute.

items.description: An object with a historic link to an external web page.

connectionsToLower.description: Array of objects with historic connections that belonged to the item as upper item.

typeName.description: Historic name of the connection type.

reverseName.description: Historic reverse name of the connection type for the reverse direction.

upperItemId.description: Id of the upper configuration item.

lowerItemId.description: Id of the lower configuration item.

lastChange.description: Date, when the last change occured

descriptions.description: List of the historic descriptions of the connections, since only that can be changed.

connectionsToUpper.description: Array of objects with historic connections that belonged to the item as lower item.

typeName.description: Historic name of the connection type.

reverseName.description: Historic reverse name of the connection type for the reverse direction.

upperItemId.description: Id of the upper configuration item.

lowerItemId.description: Id of the lower configuration item.

lastChange.description: Date, when the last change occured

descriptions.description: List of the historic descriptions of the connections, since only that can be changed.

searchContent.description: Search criteria. At least one of the properties nameOrValue, itemTypeId or attributes must be set.

nameOrValue.description: Part of a configuration item name or attribute value to search for.

itemTypeId.description: Id of an item type to be searched for. If this object is used inside a neighbor search, it must be identical to the other item type id.

attributes.description: Array of attribute types and values to search for.

items.description: An object with attribute information to search for.

typeId.description: Id of the attribute type to search for

value.description: Value of the attribute type, if empty, search for non existent items, value can be negated with leading exclamation mark.

connectionsToUpper.description: Array of connection criteria to search for.

items.description: An object with connection information to search for.

connectionTypeId.description: Id of the connection type, that a searched item must possess.

itemTypeId.description: Optional. Id of the item type, that the connection must have.

count.description: Number of connections, that an item must possess. 0 = none, 1 = one, 1+ = at least one, 2+ = more than one.

connectionsToLower.description: Array of connection criteria to search for.

items.description: An object with connection information to search for.

connectionTypeId.description: Id of the connection type, that a searched item must possess.

itemTypeId.description: Optional. Id of the item type, that the connection must have.

count.description: Number of connections, that an item must possess. 0 = none, 1 = one, 1+ = at least one, 2+ = more than one.

changedAfter.description: A date, after that the item was changed.

changedBefore.description: A date, after which the item was not changed anymore.

responsibleUser.description: The account name of the user that must be part of the responsible users' list.

itemTypeId.description: Id of the item type to search

extraSearch.description: Extra filter conditions for the result

upperId.name: upperId
upperId.description: Id of the upper item or item type

lowerId.name: lowerId
lowerId.description: Id of the lower item or item type

name.name: name
name.description: name of an item or type

idList.name: idList
idList.description: Single mongo id or comma separated list of ids.

count.name: count
count.description: Number of items to be connected to.

queryPage.name: page
queryPage.description: Starting page for retrieving items, in portions of 1000 at max
